Title: Relates to transitioning all rent controlled housing accommodations to be rent stabilized
Summary: Relates to transitioning all rent controlled housing accommodations to be rent stabilized on January 1, 2020.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to transitioning all rent controlled housing accommodations to be rent stabilized
